text: Martin is a village in Red River Parish, Louisiana, United States. It is the second most populous municipality in Red River Parish (after Coushatta). == Education == Martin and all of Red River Parish are served by the Red River Parish School District. Zoned campuses include Red River Elementary School (Grades PK-5), Red River Junior High School (Grades 6-8), and Red River Senior High School (Grades 9-12). Riverdale Academy, the only K-12 private school in Red River Parish, is located in the hamlet of East Point. == External links == Category:Villages in Red River Parish, Louisiana
title: Martin, Louisiana
